member.name: ICommDlgBrowser3.GetCurrentFilter
member.summary: Gets the current filter as a Unicode string.
member.param: Contains a pointer to the current filter path/file as a Unicode string.
Specifies the path/file length, in characters.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ICommDlgBrowser3.OnColumnClicked
member.summary: Called after a specified column is clicked in the interface.
member.param: A pointer to the interface of the hosted view.
The index of the column clicked.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ICommDlgBrowser3.OnPreViewCreated
member.summary: Called after a specified preview is created in the interface.
member.param: A pointer to the interface of the hosted view.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ICommDlgBrowser3
member.summary: Extends the capabilities of , and used by the common file dialog boxes when they host a Shell browser.
